values: The only problem with conceptual reality is that when I don't agree it's really hard to over-ride every living thing around me... sometimes. :) Getting close to vacation... :-D the living room is still torn apart in a measley attempt to make it better, every time I turn around I'm walking into the dentist, doctors, or other phd's office.... Ok, I'm blowing things out of proportion.... but it feels that way for the moment. I hope that everyone is doing well and the best to all of you :)

Work, work, and more work.... And then there is the drama... and people wonder why I've dropped off of the face of the planet?  I miss a few people, but I don't miss the drama and I just don't have time for it.  Things are starting to get a little more normal after all of the chaos.  I'm hoping that I can get a chance to say hi to a lot of people soon.... Maybe :) 

I hope that everyone is doing well. 

Blessed be...

After months of little sleep and way too much on our plates, our lives are starting to get back to normal.  Hectic but good and then lots of sleep and a trip with a 5-year old to Montana for a family reunion and back and we survived. :) We've both gone back to work and are trying to remember what real life is like.  It was nice to take a break but you have to come back eventually.  

Blessed be to all.

It's been a while and I've been so busy that I haven't had much time to think.  Life for the moment for us has become work and wedding... People ask if I'm excited and don't get me wrong I am... but I'm wondering if this is why people started to take time off and go somewhere for a honeymoon!?!  By the time everything is done you both feel as if you are going to loose your minds. 

Work is going well... can't complain and I won't.  I don't know exactly what I'm doing from day to day and my boss decided that I'm a pretty good "quick change artist"... that can be taken a couple of different ways... I'm going to translate it to "Jack of all trades" and take it as a compliment.  

A few people still insist on causing drama, or trying.  That's the nice thing about being  so damn busy lately.  I don't have time to pay much attention and my give a damn is broke... 

Busy, busy, busy... I'll be able to pretend that I'm social soon... I hope :)

What Your Purple Umbrella Says About You
When faced with adversity, you remain together and graceful.
You are very balanced, and it's hard for you to let yourself get too down.

You are brainy and philosophical. It's hard for you to lose your broad perspective on life.
You accept things as they are. You don't try to change anything that can't be changed.

On a rainy day: you should spend the day reading
The Umbrella Test

You Are 80% Goth
You are clearly goth. Even if you don't consider yourself goth, other people do.
Let's face it. You're a little moodier, darker, and weirder than most people.
But that's okay. You enjoy being different, and you're proud of who you are.
Many psychologists think that goths are more self aware and smarter than the average person!
Are You Goth?

You aren't sure where you came from. Perhaps your sire did an embrace and run. Or maybe your sire was an outcast himself. Either way, your powers are unique and really don't belong to any clan...or maybe a little from each. Because you of these circumstances, you aren't really sure where you belong. You tend to wander and do a bit of soul searching in your eternal life. Maybe some day...you have a while after all.

What Vampire Clan Do You Belong To?

You can't expect to change someone
but you can't keep them from changing either...

blah is about it... :T

Otherwise, Happy new year everyone and have a safe one too... 

:D

I know that a lot of people do a lot of crazy things for love... and I'm one of them, the only problem is when I lose sight of myself and hurt people that don't really want to fight anymore... Well, I was trying to fight for what mattered most, and I lost... I don't blame anyone and there should be none... I hope, but that is being burried so damn far down that I will be suprised if I see it again anytime soon. Maybe with help I will see it again... What can I say, I'm sorry, I forgive and I hope. 

Blessed be to all, 
A

How do you heal the time of wounds? If I knew I would not be trying to dig them up and heal myself... I just wish I could also heal the ones that I love. I am not an angel and never professed to be, but when I was younger, I believed that true love would heal all wounds.  Maybe I am jaded...

32 LEAVES LYRICS

"All Is Numb"

C'mon drift away through fundamental boundaries
To find ourselves surrounding
The ones who've already gone and come back stronger

All is numb
I've been lost too long
My fate's been mistakenly chosen
All is numb
Yeah I've done you wrong
My fate's been mistakenly chosen

Here you'll stay
Where lies are spread wide open
And ties are not so strong
That place you'll never find me
I've already gone

[chorus]

I guess my thinking too much is what's been f*&%$n' me up
It's my own worst enemy, but
It will never own me...
Who am I kidding anyway?

[chorus]

So the holidays are back and so is the holiday depression and trouble... So I can't complain about anything really, since things could be much worse... But I wish that communication were not such a foreign concept... If it's important in your life why then aren't you sharing it... or is it that so many of us want to go through the pain of the land of ice and snow alone? 
(if you wanted an optimistic letter from me, now is not the time to expect one from me) So here I sit once again, and my bed will remain empty once again for I can't sleep and there is no point in it anyway, it just makes things harder to get done since... well you can't really do much in your sleep... and ... stuff...

To those who are enjoying the holidays, I hope that all goes well and that they will definitely be merry and bright. As for the rest of us, I hope that it gets better as the world freezes and takes a break from the rush of life in the fast lane and the growth that is attempted when the world thaws... 

Merry holidays all...

Communication between two or more people is such a fragile thing and is so easy to break... Why does it seem that some people can speak without even saying a word, then the next person doesn't seem to hear a word that you say even when you are screaming...
What type of Fae are you?

Well the good news is, I am offically divorced!!! Yeah!!! 

The bad news is... I am not working at the moment, going through the damn grieving process AGAIN... and trying to get through it as quickly as possible so that I can get on with my life after the long and slow tortured death that has finally come to the biggest mistake in my life... getting married to that p.o.s.... 
<lj-cut>
Note: slightly pessimistic at the moment, so take this with a grain of salt. 

So my biggest puzzle as of late is... trying to get through school. I realize that I do not have the stamina of some of my stronger friends to push it to the limit for long periods of time and still have bills to pay... the rock and the hard place is exactly... going to school full time so that I can make good money, have a good life and tell my ex where to shove it... :P Problem... I don't seem to be doing well with a full time job and school at the same time... 4 hours of sleep doesn't seem to cut it... but I still have bills to pay (don't we all!?!) and can't not work while I go to school... *damn!*  The only conclusion that I have been able to come to thus far is *drumroll* suck it up, get a part-time job and live broke while I pay bills, get smart, and a piece of paper that says that I am smart so that I get a kick a** job and hopefully make all of the bill collectors happy so that I can move on with my life without my concious telling me that I am not working hard enough...   

(when I said mental vomit... I wasn't kidding :D)

On a lighter note... I hope that everyone is doing well and wish the best to those that I love. 

Blessed be*

"Isobel"

I thought it was funny when you missed the train
When I rang you at home they said you left yesterday
I thought it was strange when your car was found
by the tree in Ennis where we used to hang around
Dear Isobel
I hope you're well and what you've done is right
Oh it's been such hell
I wish you well and hope you're safe tonight

It's been a long day coming and long will it last
when it's last day leaving, and I'm helping it pass
by loving you more

And who he would become, all the things he'd have done
would he have loved you, and not let you down
and would he be stronger than his father
don't punish yourself, leave it well alone

Dear Isobel
I hope you're well and what you've done is right
Oh it's been such hell
I wish you well and hope you're safe tonight

It's been a long day coming and long will it last
when it's last day leaving, and I'm helping it pass
by loving you more

Had a good day today... got a couple of things done and got to see my daughter for the first time in about a month... In really need to get my priorities straight... I have missed her so much that it was nice to spend some quality time with her... 

as for school... my paper is done for tomorrow, but I do not feel like I'm ready for the test tomorrow... Does anyone want to take an anatomy test on the muscles for me??? Ah well, I will do the best that I can.

In good news, I finally got my snowboard off of layaway and I also found the boots that I wanted for about half the price... :D I'm hoping that I can have everything put together in time for snowboarding season....:-D

Good luck all...

You Are Catwoman
"Life's a bitch. Now so am I."
What Superheroine Are You?

The good news is that I'm back in school and trying to get good grades again... trying being the operative word. To be honest, going to work at 4am, getting off at 3pm and then going to school from 6-10pm is starting to wear on me quite a bit. I like my job, but I don't want to make a career out of it and to be bluntly honest with myself, it is cutting into my school and I am unfortunately not superwoman... I think RUSH put it very adequately when they said "We are young, wand'ring the face of the earth, wond'ring what our live might be worth, learning that we're only immortal, for a limited time..." I don't feel all that young anymore... *pout*  If only... (insert your own musings here) 
So basically it comes down to the fact that I need to make some decisions for my life again and I can't have it all........ *damn*  Until then I will stay not so comfortably numb so that I can face the world one day at a time... :D

What was that I said about screaming inside and not being heard!?! Here we go for another round and I have lost count of how many... 

I am currently working full time and going to school full time, I also get to see my daughter for a few hours every couple of weeks. On top of that I am waiting for the local judge to review and "hopefully" put his signature on my divorce papers. (for those of you who don't know, I have been trying to "peacefully" get my ex-husband to sign the divorce papers for three years, the final of which I filed of the 24th of Sept. Sometimes I wish I would have sold everything that I owned back then, hired a lawyer and nailed his a** to the wall. I wonder if it would have been as satisfying as I imagine... maybe.) 

Basically, I have a very full plate and on top of everything, am not really socializing with anyone outside of work and school.  

Yeah for the meltdown!!! 

As for me, I will make it through just like I always have. 
I just hope that things don't burn around me as I temper the storm.  That's the trouble with the phoenix, it has a tendency to take things with it on the burn day... but the precious seems to survive through.... *glimmer of hope*.

You Are a Blue Crayon
Your world is colored in calm, understated, deep colors. You are a loyal person, and the truest friend anyone could hope to find. On the inside, you tend to be emotional and even a bit moody. However, you know that people depend on you. So you put on a strong front. Your color wheel opposite is orange. Orange people may be opinionated, but you feel they lack the depth to truly understand what they're saying.
What Color Crayon Are You?

Some days are wonderful, and some you just want to scream, and you are, but it's all inside and it won't come out. 

I had an appointment with my ex-husband to finish up some paperwork that has been needing to be done for sometime.... so I go to my appointment first thing in the morning and when I get out, I call my ex, or at least I tried to... Once again, he says he is going to do something and when it comes down to it... yup, you guessed it... I'm there standing by myself to clean up our mess alone... again.  And not only that, I'm probably going to have to find a way to force the issue and get it done or it will never be done. 

On top of everything... I am getting a new partner at work... this could be a good thing, but everyone that I have talked to that has worked with her before... well let's just say that I hope that I don't have to play hardball with the corporate bs polotics so that my life at work doesn't become a living hell... 

On a good note... I got to see RUSH last night!!! It was awesome and I'm glad that I got to see them at least once.  I didn't get to see them on their fairwell tour and thought that I would not get to see them at all.... I'm glad that I was wrong... 

Some good and some not so good, but everything is slowly comming together... in time.

So I just left the spa, curtosy of the man who is trying to help me find my sanity....:D and now I am trying to bring my divorce docs up to date and get a hold of my (hopefully) soon to be ex-husband so that we can go over the paperwork, sign it and file it.... just as we both agreed to do today.....:T 
There only seems to be one problem... He's no where to be found....(shock, shock).  So now, I am going to go get yet another copy of an almost 100 page document (I'm sure most of you already know, but I'm venting, bear with me), drive all the way down to Springville, and try to track him down again, stuff him into the car (I'll even try to be nice about it), and drag him down to file the paperwork... That is if he is not hiding.

Either way, if things go well or not, tonight is going to be great!!!.  I didn't think that I was going to be able to go and see one of my favorite bands since I put so damn much $$$ into making sure that B not only got to go see Dream Theater, but also got a back stage pass....(damn I'm good... or just a sucker... well, maybe both).  Well, what are best friends for!?! They usually know you better than you do... and get you tickets for RUSH when you can't afford it cause so many days have hit you all at once..... Thank you Kathy!!! It's going to be fun and let's ditch the guys....;D. 

So either way, it's a good day and I hope everyone has one as well.....

So I think that I will be a hermit for some time... I no longer have a computer, I'm looking for a job and trying to keep up in school... and trying to make time for the precious people in my life... I could name a few, but you know.... well... you know...:D 
I will try to keep in touch where I can... 
Best to all... 

-signed- 
the strange small furry beast that squeaks when she's happy...

Well, now I have to go out and buy the second season of ER... I couldn't sleep last night and so I watched the last half of the season. 
The only problem with sleep depping?!? I finally fell asleep about 1pm and needed to be to school at 2pm for my online orientation. I'm taking an online class since I've already taken the other class that they are offereing and don't want to waste my time and money by taking it again... although a refresher course would be nice. Oh well, I need the credits and retaking classes won't give me that. 
Either way, I finally woke up at 3pm and flew down to school to talk to a couple of my teachers and the registar so that I can take the online class. I may be paying a small fortune for my education, but it's worth it. These people are awesome!!! 
So, I've tried to log in numerous times and still can't log in... :T  So the next hurdle to jump over is getting the correct login... the system doesn't think that I exsist... then again, sometimes I wonder if I'm really here... thoughts for another days contemplation. 
Anyway... everyone have a good time and all of that good stuff..... 

And yes, I'm getting over whatever the hell B gave me that turned the world into a marri-go-round... yay:D I don't think I want that bug again... EVER

Good news, I'm definately feeling better today...YAYH... or however the hell you spell it... :D

going to bed though, I'm still exausted after work and trying to catch up on a week's worth of not doing anything but sleep eat and well, the rest is history. I don't think I could really remember most of it if I tried anyway.  It's pretty bad when you open your eyes and the world spins one way, you close your eyes and the world starts to spin the other.... I don't like it.....

You Will Be a Cool Parent
You seem to naturally know a lot about parenting, and you know what kids need. You can tell when it's time to let kids off the hook, and when it's time to lay down the law. While your parenting is modern and hip, it's not over the top. You know that there's nothing cool about a parent who acts like a teenager... or a drill sergeant!
Would You Be a Cool Parent?

I don't know what the hell this is. But those of you who don't have it... YOU DON'T WANT IT!
I have been in bed for the past four days, missed two days of work and two days of school. My only hope is that my teacher will let me make up the final since I've been so damn sick. 
It takes quite a bit for me to start camping in the dinning room for days on end. 
I'm hoping that I am starting to get over this, but it's hard to say, I was doing great for a day and then I went to work and got the fever back... 
I'll get over it eventually. 
I've just been really grumpy and I know that if I start taking cold medicine to get through work, I'll be fine for a bit, then I will crash hard. Don't want to do that. 
On another note, I miss my sweetie... :( You got me sick so come a take care of me damnit!!!

Now that I've whined, everyone have a good day/night. 
:D

Travel Horoscope for Aries
When you travel, you literally want to see a whole different world. You want a vacation full of adventure, exotic sights, and tons of variety. You should travel to: India Kenya New Zealand Brazil Thailand
What's Your Travel Horoscope?

What Your Hands Say About You
You are logical, analytical, and rational. You have good verbal skills. Idealistic and dreamy, you tend toward the impractical. You have a knack for getting yourself in sticky situations. Consistent and reliable, you like to count on structure and routine in your life. Your emotions tend to be relaxed and uncomplicated. You don't read too much into things.
What Do Your Hands Say About You?

You Are 60% Sexy
Your Sex Appeal Is: High You're quite sexy, and you're probably at least partially aware of your powers. Don't let your self doubt ever get the best of you. You're even more attractive than you know.
How Much Sex Appeal Do You Have?

With wind tossed hair and scattered cognition, 
This storm to weather, 
Founding doubtful rumination, 
Wondering if the wake will end, 
Dreams are only a parting friend,   

To one I call and all else forsake, 
Or is it I, who must break, 
The clouds clear for a moment in time, 
I remember the wonders that one could find. 

The sky is grey, the clouds recondite, 
When will they then, go to resign, 
Hand in hand, and heart in heart, 
To walk the land storms do depart... 

This mystic world for to endure, 
Where every step should be sure, 
I walk abreast, whom which I love, 
With aspirations reckon.

So, I start school tomorrow, and have about three other things to acomplish as well before I even get to school. 

<lj-cut>

So, it gets to a point that I realise that all is calm as long as I keep my mouth shut and do not bring up any inquiry of wrongdoing towards me or any argument to the effect that I have been wronged in the slightest. I do, and suddenly, I am to explain the definition of every word that was said and nothing of the real point is addressed. And when I do try to bring the actual point back up, I get another reason that I am not understood because I didn't use exactly the correct wording to convey my thoughts and emotions. Never mind the fact that it seems to be the prefered vehicle to argue the point into anothers favor instead of asking why I feel this way.... I don't know. 

Maybe one day my voice will be heard instead of just endured. I have concerns too, but I don't believe that they are being taken seriously or addressed. 

So ends another wonderful night with a petty banter that could have been avoided if I had known to  not turn on the radio at that paticular point in time. Nevermind that I can't read minds.... still trying but... nope, still can't. (yes, I'm getting a little petty myself... venting). 

Have a lot of things to do tomorrow.... and I still can't sleep, never really can when the dogs of war come out to play and I seem like I'm in the loosing pack.  The war is over and I am not the enemy!!!! Maybe one day I can be heard over the din of the battlefield... 

Another night, and another day to try once again. And to get one more thing done to ensure my eventual freedom from my own past...

Damn, my life is messed up!!!!!

Good news, I went to orientation for school and got my class schedule for next week. I'm going to be busy for a while. 

My Ex is trying to enroll in the same program at the same time that I am taking... This could prove to be interesting... the good news about this though, I know enough people that if he wants to try to cause me problems... I can get them to put us in different classes...:D

Well, we can tell how much I can focus lately... I started this on the 30th and now I'm finishing it on the 1st.... Me??? Forgetfull?!? Never!!!

:D

And for all of my enjoyment in the last few months of bad luck, I get to say one thing that a lot of people don't..... 

I KNOW WHAT THAD'S BIRTHDAY PRESENT IS!!!!!!!!!

As for the bad luck, I'm starting to enjoy it due to the fact that I can laugh at myself before any of you get to.........
Anyone who takes me too seriously.... It's your own damn fault...:D

Can't really sleep, and now that some of the past is out somewhere... I don't know if anyone really considers this paper... :T

<lj-cut>

I know that the state of the heart can blind absolutely. Being that I am trying to live day by day at this point in my life... I hope that I can do better than yesterday. 
I have started to put myself back together, remembering the things that I want to accomplish, the little things that make me and others smile, in all affects, the little things in life. 
This life will ever be exactly the way that I expect it to be, but that doesn't mean that I have to loose me...

I'm starting school again in Feb, this being one of the goals that have been put off due to a lot of circumstances within and without my control. 
I just keep remembering that the degree is mine to hold and be proud of if I can only but work towards this day by day. 

Sometimes I wonder if I have done something in some past life to make it so that many of those around me seem to achieve their goals with little or no effort. 
Every step that I take, even through the next looks clear, as soon as I get close to it, another metephorical boulder is dropped in my path... 

I just keep thinking that if I take a step or two every day that eventually I will reach the things that will make me a happy person, and maybe I can find that happy person before I even reach the summit... maybe I just need to learn a few things... 

Someone said that to know what happiness truly is, you must know misery and pain. 
The only thing that I don't like about this fact is, once you know how happy you can truly be, the void of pain and misery cuts that much deeper because you know exactly what you are missing. 

It is a strange thing having little regrets in life. Some think that pain is a byproduct of regret... I don't think so. I believe that it is much more complicated than this. 
I regret very little in my life and there are only a couple of things that I would change if I could... then again I'm not so sure that I would. 

I regret only one thing that I could have changed in the past 2 1/2 years. I shoulda, coulda woulda spoke my heart sooner. Much of the pain, and tears "may" have been saved for saying three words a couple of weeks sooner.. then again maybe not. 

The art of the unknown can be very tricky and unstable in the hands of the wrong person... maybe this is why it is so difficult to learn and most of all understand. The smallest change in anything can change everything... and nothing all at the same time. 

I have seen the effects of these gifts abused by those who took the easy path, and I wonder if they even knew where these choices would lead everyone. I don't think the untrained, or uncarring mind has a clue to the aftermath even when they are living in it. Life can be so much more with a better understanding of self and then the world around. Most often we loose something when we try to play the adult role and don't fully understand the implications. I know that I still don't understand a lot of everything. 

I think that it may be time to start studying myself again... I have lost many things in my life in recent years, and I think in this I may have lost sight of myself as well. I remember being the sage beyond my years some time ago... and honestly... I miss it very much. Many things in life didn't nessaraly make sense, but I handled them much better and learned much more from my mistakes. 

Or maybe I just had teenitis....:D I "thought" that I knew everything... *shrug*
Either way, I'm not going to get anywhere just standing here, now am I???

To any of you who really care to listen..... to a fucked up story that is.... reality or fiction... you decide.....

<lj-cut>

No I haven't really been myself for a very long time now. 
I allowed my heart to hope, and that hope was shattered. 
And even after this, I continued to hope, I just wonder if the token that I gave during an exchange of heart means anything to the one that I gave my heart to... I see it every few months or so. I only take mine off when I have to. Maybe I'm wrong. 
Call me weird or symbolic, but it is part of who I am. 
After the "official" agreements were made, I still felt like I was playing second fiddle to one who wanted nothing more than to destroy everything that she professed to love. 
And I continued to pay for the things that I didn't do. 
I accepted this and kept trying. 
Then I got pushed even farther away, because heaven forbid that I actually get hurt in any of this and want some semblance of understanding and sympathy from the one I have been paying for to love. 
Eventually, slipped into a deep depression... which just makes everything worse since now I'm not the happy go luck person that he thought I was. Of course I'm not, I'm broken by your hand and you don't seem to understand that I paid a much larger price of the heart than I ever let you know.  Maybe I should have, but what difference would it make, you wouldn't hear me at the time even if I screamed, begged, or cried. 

So now, I slowly trek out of my abyss, praying that finally, I can stop wondering if it is all over, or if I will continue to fade into the background no matter what I do. 
At first I felt like I belonged, free, happy, and complete in the midst of chaos. 

Now, I wonder if my voice is heard, listened to, or even acknowledged. I know that after so long of trying to go the extra mile, forget everything and move on, it gets harder and harder when you are not allowed to outlive and create a new day... I think this goes for both of us. 

The real confession is, no I haven't been trying lately, I haven't for a couple of months. I don't want to be ignored, snapped at, or pushed away any time I try anymore. I am trying so hard to be the culprit of such things myself, but I am not perfect either. 

I miss my best friend...


Note: some of the names and places have been changed to protect the innocent... or maybe it's just because of faulty memory.... we may never know...

It's pretty sad when you realize that the only way that you are ever going to be able to make something of yourself and live life, is to rarely sleep... I haven't been a serious insomniac for a very long time... It takes alot so I do try to avoid it, but it seems to be the only way to get anything done anymore... 

Maybe I shouldn't have told so many people that I would sleep when I was dead when I was a teenager... 

Fair night all...

So, I work all damn night on computers... and then I come home and sit in front of a computer, like this is good for my eyes or something... yup... 

I've got other stuff I could do, but I'm too damn tired... like I ever sleep anymore... maybe I shouldn't have said one of my favorite lines as a teen so damn much... 

I'll sleep when I'm dead... 

Well, it kinda looks that way anyway...:D

Anywho, everyone have a great day! That's an order damnit!!! :D

You Should Rule Saturn
Saturn is a mysterious planet that can rarely be seen with the naked eye. You are perfect to rule Saturn because like its rings, you don't always follow the rules of nature. And like Saturn, to really be able to understand you, someone delve beyond your appearance. You are not an easy person to befriend. However, once you enter a friendship, you'll be a friend for life. You think slowly but deeply. You only gain great understanding after a situation has past.
What Planet Should You Rule?
have a good day everyone, I'll stop it with the surveys for a bit.... :D

You Are Midnight
You are more than a little eccentric, and you're apt to keep very unusual habits. Whether you're a nightowl, living in a commune, or taking a vow of silence - you like to experiment with your lifestyle. Expressing your individuality is important to you, and you often lie awake in bed thinking about the world and your place in it. You enjoy staying home, but that doesn't mean you're a hermit. You also appreciate quality time with family and close friends.
What Time Of Day Are You?

You Date Like a Woman
According to studies on dating, you date like a woman. You tend to take romance seriously, and you're not really out for a fling. A mental and emotional connection always comes first for you. And rushing the physical stuff is likely to turn you off. You're highly selective when it comes to dating, and some may say you're too picky. You know what you want, and when you find it, you're ready to commit.
Do You Date Like a Man or a Woman?

You Sometimes Don't Get Enough Sleep
You're often more tired than you'd like, and you're probably not getting enough quality sleep. Sleeping a little more could make you a lot more energetic and happy. Try having a bedtime, keep your bedroom cool, and only eat fruit before bed.
Do You Get Enough Sleep?

You Are 12% Lady
You're a pretty crass, and even a bit crude on occasion. Manners don't matter to you, but they sure matter to those around you.
Are You A Lady?

Your Emoticon Is Laughing
You've got a wicked sense of humor. You're everyone's favorite IM buddy... at least today!
What Emoticon Best Represents You Right Now?
